1.content:
Sora and his friends drink Alice's tea and shrink on the table, only to be found by you. Now, the crumpets/scones/crosiants to go with your real tea, you decide to play with and prepare them before you dine. Shrunken boys include; Aladin, Hercules, Peter Pan, Sora, Riku, Pense, Hayner, Roxas, Tidus, Wakka, Axel, Rai, Seifer, Cloud, Leon, demyx, lea, Isa, mowgli, terra, ventus, Leno, inenzo, Zach, and now the world ends with us characters too!!!

Where will you store them in the meantime?
1.title: Decisions

11.content: You have them all caged ready for cooking. Who to pick though?
11.title: cages

15.content: Do you want to split Sora up into his normal and four other forms (Wisdom, valor, etc.) to enable you to eat that tasty morsal five seperate times, ans savor his flavor? How about having both a sora and riku from kh1 and 2?
15.title: Split up

151.content: Looking down at the 22 little boys, you lick your lips. They all looked so delicious. And those big feet, and plump fingers... OOh, this was gonna be so good. You decide to keep them as pets/toys for the time being, but lets start with a little taste test... Picking up the original sora, he is the size of your hand, and he sits in your palm, trembling and staring form big, blue, beautiful eyes. You remove one of his shoes and the sock.
151.title: Taste Test

1511.content:
You place the shoe on the side for the moment, grinning down at the cute boy in your palm. Patting him on top of the head, shivers are sent down his spine as he is raised closer to your face.

"Don't you look exquisitely delicious?" you say, wiping away some drool that has emerged at the corners of your mouth. I'd love to experiment with you using my new cookbook, "cooking with teens".

Screams are heard ringing out from all over the table as the four inch boys protest, realizing their fate. You pay no attention however, as you raise his soft hair to your nose. Sniffing him, you salivate more. "And you smell just heavenly..." He is too scared to even close his eyes as his foot dangles off of your hand a little. The other boys are standing at the edge of the table, threatening you. Pence is the only one withdrawn, hiding behind Hayner.

"Don't worry, you boys will have a turn soon enough. I want to taste all of you, and sample those heavenly huge feet," you announce licking your lips. This is gonna be good.

Picking up the shoe and sweaty sock again, you inhale it's contents deeply and are filled with an angelic scent of boy feet, fear, and other glorious aromas. "Oh, Sora, you must really work out. You probably get your excercise battling those heartless.. Even your shoes smell good enough to eat. Its such a salty-sweet, like those ice-creams you boys like so much." Your head spins in anticipation as Sora struggles a little and curls up with your pointer finger, straining to stand.

"Now, I'll get back to sniffing later... first I have to see how I'm going to prepare you. Don't worry", you say, seeing how shaken the small young man had gotten, "not yet. I still have to season you, marinate you, prepare, and plumpen you up a little. Plus, I'd like to play a few games with you." You bend over to sample a little lick of his dangling bare foot.
1511.title: Mmm mmm good

choices: You pull back to taste somethng else, or do something else
15111.content: The moment your tongue touches Sora's soft, glistening skin, your eyes spasm with the honeylike orgasmic taste of his feet. Like the sweetest ambrosia, his toes curl up on your tongue. The huge foot shakes involuntarily as Sora eyes begin to tear.... but you want more. Soon his entire foot is in your mouth as you suckle his plump delicious toes and work the morsal around in your mouth, making sucking and 'mmm'ing noises. The small teen continues to cry in your hand, as the tickling feeling of your tongue and saliva play with the succulent foot. Reassuringly you play with his hair with one finger and stroke his back while you lick him like a fruity lollipop a few times before lapping up the foot and engulfing it into your mouth again.
15111.title: How does it taste?

151111.content: You pull back and start licking his chest. Then you start to prepare
151111.title: You pull back to taste somethng else, or do som...

info.brief_description: After drinking Alice's magic tea, Sora and friends shrink.You just found some new treats.

Now, the crumpets/scones/crosiants to go with your real tea, you decide to play with and prepare them before you dine. Shrunken boys include; Aladin, Hercules, Peter Pan, Sora, Riku, Pense, Hayner, Roxas, Tidus, Wakka, Axel, Rai, Seifer, Cloud, Leon, and Demyx
